==Introduction==
*Casper* is a simple scriplet language written in java and uses same tag conversion like     JSP.Following script tag can be used to script.
   # ===Scriptlet=== - *<%* _javascript code_ *%>*

  # ===Expression=== = *<%=* _javascript code_ *%>*
